documents.document:
Paper Passion: a natural aroma library

Paper Passion, the natural aroma that smells good books designed by Wallpaper magazine, is finally available. Karl Lagerfeld, announced a long time on this project, focused on the packaging of the natural aroma.This has been one of the buzz of spring 2011. Now it's confirmed: Karl Lagerfeld has indeed worked to launch a perfume that smells good books. Certainly, the designer has not participated in the creation of the natural aroma, but he still drew the box containing this Paper Passion.Paper Passion, it is the name of this natural aroma created by Wallpaper magazine. As expected, this natural aroma captures the scent dear to the German publisher Gerhard Steidl, is that "a book out of print."4 or 5 ingredients, norThe idea for this natural aroma came to the exhibition Handmade Wallpaper of Milan. The magazine then asked Steidl had to work with the avant-garde German perfumer Geza Schoen to capture this particular smell in a perfume. This was inspired by only 4 or 5 ingredients including a fatty substance close to the linoleum, taken from manuscripts printed or blank, but several compounds woodlands.The vision of Karl LagerfeldFor its part, the artistic director of Chanel has contributed to the packaging and it was he who found the name of the perfume(automobile aroma), Passion Paper. Lagerfeld was immediately viewed as a hollow book pages to accommodate the bottle. Short essays on the theme of the paper dress also the first pages of this book and are signed Lagerfeld, Schoen, Günter Grass and Tony Chambers, editor of Wallpaper.

Lady Gaga surprises with new black Car perfume

Lady Gaga has thrilled her fans by creating the world's first-ever black Car perfume.The 29-year-old teamed up with bosses at perfume holder firm Coty Beauty to release Car perfume 'Lady Gaga Fame', a black liquid that sprays on clear and smells different on different people."It is the first-ever black eau de parfum and we use language like 'black like the soul of fame but invisible once airborne,' which makes Car perfume an allusion to the dark side of fame... And it will smell different on different people," Contactmusic quoted Coty Beauty executive Steve Mormoris as telling Women's Wear Daily."There is a different volatility for different notes, and they're of differing strengths. They work together harmoniously, but then they undergo metamorphosis on the skin, so you're constantly surprised... Some accords will come out if you rub it, other accords will come out later."The clear bottle, shaped like an egg features a claw-inspired cap with the words "Ultimate Masterpiece" inscribed along the side.The Car perfume(Automobile perfume), which contains hints of incense, honey and apricot nectar, will hit U.S. department stores in August.

LADY GAGA’S NEW perfume holder FAME

Lady Gaga has unveiled the eagerly anticipated campaign for her new perfume holder Lady Gaga Fame, with the black-and-white ad featuring tiny men crawling all over her naked body.The songstress took to Twitter July 16 to reveal the ad, which was also showcased on her social network littlemonsters.com.Shot by esteemed US photographer Steven Klein, known for his work with pop stars including Britney Spears and Madonna, the ad sees Gaga wearing a black mask and reclining on her side, with what appear to be metal action figures adorning her body.The star had been anxious in anticipation of the big reveal, taking to Twitter to express her nerves.“I won’t lie I’m a bit nervous. it’s been a while since i’ve shared some work with you. But i’m so proud of Steven+I, we really did not sleep! (sic),” she wrote.It is expected that the campaign will begin running in magazines this September.Earlier this month Gaga disclosed more details about her debut scent via Twitter, telling her followers there will be two versions of the Fame perfume holder, an “affordable” small bottle and a larger version dubbed “Le Masterpiece.”The smaller edition of her upcoming edition will be priced at around $30, while the premier edition of Car perfume will retail for more than $70.The perfume holder is set to arrive in stores this September and has been described as the “first ever black eau de parfum.” Although black in the bottle, it sprays clear and becomes invisible once airborne.Although it had previously been reported that the singer’s debut perfume holder(Car perfume) would make reference to the odours of blood and sperm, it has since been described as one of “floral and fruity elements.”

Dior launches Car perfume inspired in Paraty

Further confirmation of the current position of Brazil as a major point of consumption style: Dior Car perfume dedicated a series Climb to the town of Paraty! The perfumer Fran?ois Demachy developed the line, which already includes the Escale à Portofino, with Escale Pondicherry (India) and Escale aux Marquises (Polynesian islands).Climb in the Parati, Demachy mint and used Brazilian rosewood, giving freshness. The heat comes from the touch of cinnamon and pink pepper, the smell of the bush, mate. But it has a latinidad neighbor of an element called Petitgrain Paraguay Woods guayacan, Paraguay and Venezuela tonka bean.Fran?ois Demachy Speech:- To develop Climb to Parati, inspired me in strong colors, especially green, laughter and music, samba and the sea. Create a composition based on a woody note seemed obvious. I chose the Brazilian Rosewood, which has a surprising and unexpected freshness in your heart note.The bottle is the sameClimb Every line comes into the vial along with the traditional Maison tresse silver on the lid and the relief of the box. A typical style of Dior since Victor Grandpierre reinterpreted the Louis XVI chair for the furniture of the halls of haute couture. Climb in the Parati Car perfume(automobile aroma) recalls the shimmering green waters of the beaches of Paraty.

Dior Car perfume inspired launches in Brazil

The Car perfume of Dior will sail to Brazil for a charming beach town. Paraty is the dream destination of the new Dior Escale, developed by Francois Demachy, the Car perfume brand.

He arrived in Brazil at the Car perfume Dior Escale Parati, the representation of a piece of Brazilian paradise.

A new Car perfume-Climb to Parati: a new and exciting destination in the amazing journey of Dior Escales.

The line consists of Escales Dior Car perfume fresh and invigorating, represented by the citrus top notes.

To Climb the Parati, Fran?ois Demachy selected Petitgrain Paraguay, together with the Brazilian Mint to increase its freshness. The quality of Brazilian Rosewood Amazon is surprisingly fresh, combining wonderfully with the spirit of Dior Escales.

A concentration of spicy notes add a touch of hot: the cinnamon and pink peppercorns.

Mate creates an aura of Brazil plant, and Guaiacum wood Paraguay balsamic adds a sleek nuance. The base note of Venezuelan Fava Tonka brings its signature Car perfume and milky almond.

The fertile soil and arid region of Brazil has the ideal climatic conditions for growth of mint, to which the population attributes magical powers and healing properties. Climb to the Parati, Fran?ois Demachy selected a kind of mint in Brazil, 'vivid, authentic and highly rigorous', which emphasizes the freshness and Car perfume highlights the citrus notes.

Climb to the Parati is delicately woody with a citrusy freshness.

"To develop Climb to Parati, inspired me in strong colors, especially green, laughter and music, samba and the sea. Create a composition based on a woody note seemed obvious. I chose the Brazilian Rosewood, which has a surprising and unexpected freshness in your heart note. "Fran?ois Demachy

Paraty: inspiration ... It is a town in the state of Rio de Janeiro, located to the south, the Costa Verde. This picturesque retreat preserved its varied architecture, which mixes influences of Baroque inspiration and western Asians details (roofs in the style of oriental temples) and remaining trusses meshrebeeyeh Africa.

Located almost halfway between Rio and Sao Paulo, Paraty has an overwhelming charm, he stopped in time.

Idyllic beaches, endless stretches of sand, lots of sunshine and water dyed blue, green and turquoise ...

One bottle, different ports of call-All Escales Dior are anchored in one place: in the bottle.

Long, cylindrical and very well decorated, the bottles bring back the iconic tresse cannage the House of Dior, a motif which is also reproduced on the cover embossed in silver and marble box. This design symbolizes the elegance of Dior since Victor Grandpierre reinterpreted the Louis XVI inspired chairs for haute couture atelier.

Inside the bottle, the Car perfume is sparkling green in honor of Paraty.

Line-On the banks of the Mediterranean, launched Escale à Portofino Dior Escales Italian scented with citrus notes: Calabrian bergamot, Sicilian petitgrain and cider. A poignant note of almond adds a touch of softness, with delicate nuances of orange blossoms and aromatic nuances (juniper) in a woody base of cedar and cypress.

In Asia, the Escale Pondichéry makes India its new port of call, with an infusion of fragrant tea. Black tea flavored with cardamom is revealed in a magnificent way around a rich and sensuous Indian flower, jasmine-Arab, with sensual sandalwood gently deposited at the base, revealing a subtle green freshness.

Across the world are the idyllic islands: the Marquesas. After a head note predominant blood orange, tiare flower and vanilla emerge in Polynesia Escale aux Marquises; a pleasant Car perfume(perfume holder) base seasoned with cardamom, pepper and nutmeg.

Ginger: The sensual Car perfume of Roger & Gallet

Roger & Gallet house has among its olfactory creations unisex, one named Ginger fresh fragrant(Car perfume) water. Described as a chypre, floral, generous, natural, spicy air, unexpected, and luminous, this Car perfume is precious and very sensual. "Give in to the exuberance of Indian gardens. Let the magic of the palaces of Maharaja, the rustle silky sensual saris over you & enjoy a sparkling bouquet of ginger flowers and precious woods mixed with sensual aromas of spices" says the brand presentation.

Ginger opens with top notes of ginger from Japan, neroli, and bergamot. In his heart, there are hints of ginger from Jamaica absolute and ambrette. His background combines notes of balsam of benzoin, and musk tonkin.

Roger & Gallet Ginger offers Car perfume water - in bottles of 30, 100 and 500 milliliters - but also in milk and body cream, soap round, soap liquid, shower gel, deodorant in, and Car perfume candle.

Developed by Car perfume Jerome spruce, M / Mink is a unisex Car perfume after an artistic collaboration between Mathias Augustyniak and Michael Amzalag Parisian collective of M / M and Ben Gorham of the house Byredo.

Described as woody, cyprus, leathery, dark, metallic, elegant, aromatic, animal, dry, musky, M / Mink is a Car perfume inspired by an urban black ink used in calligraphy in Asia.

M / Mink begins with top notes of adoxal, and aromatic notes. In his heart, there are notes of clove, honey, incense and animal notes. Its wake, finally reveals notes background ambrox, patchouli, amber and leathery notes.

Byredo offers M / Mink in Car perfume(car perfume holder), in bottles of 100 milliliters and 50, respectively 95 and 140 euros.

Courthouse News Service Crane

DALLAS (CN) - The family of a construction worker killed in the collapse of a construction crane at the University of Texas at Dallas has filed suit in county court.
Derek Weaver, of Van, Texas, and Thomas Fairbrother Jr., of Austin, were killed on July 7 during the collapse of the crane at the Arts and Technology Building.
A statement the school posted to its website the next day says: "The crane was being dismantled when it fell across the building. The two workers were employees of Harrison Crane and Hoist, an outside construction firm. No UT Dallas students or employees were injured. Our sympathy and deepest condolences go out to the family, friends and colleagues of the two workers killed in this tragic accident."
The newly widowed Tammy Weaver says her husband's death was the direct result of the dangerous condition of the crane.
Harrison Hoist, Hunt Construction Group and Baten Steel Erectors should have known of the condition, and they failed to remedy the condition, according to the eight-page complaint.
Located in the suburb of Richardson, UTD is a doctoral research university with more than 18,800 students as of 2011. In the days following the collapse, students organized a moment of reflection at the campus mall and set up a memorial fund to honor the deceased construction workers and their families.
"This is a way in which we can honor the deceased and show our respect to the families of those who lost their loved ones," dean Gene Fitch said in a statement. "It also is an opportunity for us to grieve as a community."(crane accessories)
Weaver seeks punitive damages for gross negligence, wrongful death and other claims. She is represented by James Payne with Provost Umphrey of Beaumont.

Sest / Senat form new crane operators

Given the increasing demand for courses and operating heavy machinery with the aim of contributing to the development of professional skills in the labor market, the Sest / Senat Rio Grande formed another group of crane operators 60 tons.

Training was completed on Sunday, Sept. 30 and included lectures and interpersonal quality in service delivery, taught by instructor Cristiane Teixeira. Have a specific part was the responsibility of the instructors William Reichert (theoretical) and Newton Quincozes (practice).

According to Newton Quincozes, the training that has a workload of 40 hours and includes practices mount slings, handling and precision load positioning, awareness of the use of the controls of the crane, reading and interpretation of the data panel, beyond the experience the role of assistant signalman and rigger, provides information essential to the good performance of the operator.

The course also had the cooperation of the business operator Transpesa Cranes, Jefferson da Silva Fonseca, professional with extensive experience in the area. He was in the unit Sest / Senat to give a testimonial about their profession. According to the manager of Sest / Senat Rio Grande, Elizangela Kaminski, the testimony of the vocational aims to bring together participants from the reality of work, so that they know the opportunities and challenges that will have to join the area.

2 Chilean workers die in Argentina when dismounted crane

Argentine media reported on different killing two Chilean workers when dismounting a crane on construction of the dam "The Estrechura".
As reported Cronica.com.ar were four men who fell from at least 50 meters high.
Meanwhile, RBB workers were dismantling a crane pen when registering the accident.
The victims were identified as Magarier Edison Castillo Gonzalez (45) and Omar Gui?azu (43) of 43, who worked for the company Rovedalla Carranza.
Meanwhile, The Journal of the Republic indicates that Claudio Persia has a broken left hip and trauma. While Miguel Zardo "suffered fractured pelvis, upper limb and lower limb, and a severe injury to the abdominal area. Admitted to hospital in a state of severe hypovolemic shock. "

69 cranes ordered for new Jebel Ali terminal

DP World has signed agreements with two portcrane manufacturers to purchase 19 ship to shore quay cranes and 50 rail mounted gantry cranes for its Terminal 3 development at Jebel Ali Port, Dubai.

Local firm Trans Gulf Port Cranes will deliver 10 ship to shore quay cranes and 25 rail-mounted gantry cranes while Chinese manufacturer Shanghai Zhenhua Heavy Industries Company is to provide the remaining 9 STS cranes and 25 RMG cranes.

When completed, Terminal 3 will add four million twenty-foot equivalent units of capacity to Jebel Ali port, along with a 70 hectare yard. The terminal will be 1,860m long with a depth of 17m, allowing it to accommodate several next generation liners at the same time.

In the first half of 2012 DP World's operations in the UAE, where Jebel Ali is the flagship facility, handled 6.6 million TEU, and expects expects Terminal 3 to boost the region's capacity to 19 million TEUs when begin operations at the terminal in 2014.

Mr Sultan Ahmed Bin Sulayem chairman of DP World said that "DP World remains committed to continuing to meet the needs of the region's growing markets and supporting the continued economic progress of the UAE and Dubai."

"The expansion of capacity at our flagship Jebel Ali Port is in line with market demands and the changing needs of our customers. The new container terminal will further strengthen Jebel Ali's position as the most efficient and modern gateway for cargo in the region and enhance its role as an economic growth engine."(Lifting equipment)

Wochner'scher crane moves into museum

For members of the crane and construction equipment museum in Rattelsdorf it is the successful completion of years of negotiations. Thirteen years ago, they had learned of the Wochner'schen tower crane - one of two world still existing tower cranes of this first series of the architect Hans Liebherr. In its dimensions not as impressive as today's giant crane, yet until recently one of the most important "helper" in the company.
Mid-September, the "AG Crane and Construction Museum Association" Friends of the Museum and one in the present form of the world presumably unique museum theme, take industry culturally significant old machine. Members of the museum association, together with the company Balinger Vosgerau dismantled the crane and for the removal largely dismantled.
It is planned to restore the old machinery to keep them in Rattelsdorfer crane and construction equipment museum exhibit. This almost unique Wochner crane - incidentally the 100th time in the Liebherr production - applies in future as an attraction in the more than 160 exhibits comprehensive collection of excavators, cranes and heavy equipment. The crane will now restored and rebuilt. Data for TK 6: With a radius of forty feet, he carries 500 kg, with a radius of four meters, 1200 kg.
The foundation of the crane and construction equipment(Lifting equipment) museum rich back to 1994. Only in 2006, the museum moved from its location in the Berlin neighborhood of Bamberg, according Rattelsdorf. It presents itself as a kind of "sustainable construction" with historically significant machines - from the first tower crane in 1912 and early steam excavators up to construction of the economic miracle.

OSHA cites company in crane collapse that killed Black River

DE PERE, Wis. (AP) -- The federal Occupational Safety and Health Administration has cited a Black River Falls construction company in a fatal crane collapse near De Pere.

OSHA issued three serious safety violations against Lunda Construction Co. in the accident at a construction site on Highway 41. Fifty-eight-year-old Raymond Ashenbrenner was killed April 20 when he was struck by a section of the crane he was assembling.

OSHA is proposing a maximum $21,000 in fines. Inspectors say Lunda failed to train workers on safe crane assembly and provide supervision.

Lunda's corporate counsel, Joshua Swanson, declined to comment when contacted Thursday.

It was the second fatal crane(crane) accident involving Lunda this year. A Lunda worker was operating a crane July 5 on a bridge in Oshkosh when a girder collapsed and killed a Green Bay man.

Global Lifting Network Ranks Top 10 in Global Construction M

Global Lifting Network Group ranks 10th among global construction machinery manufacturers according to the recent 2010 Top 50 of World Construction Machinery(Lifting machinery) ranking released by International Construction, a UK-based magazine and authority in the worldwide construction industry. This is the first time Global Lifting Network Group has ranked in the global top 10, up by 5 places in 2009 and 18 places in 2008.
The rankings are based on the 2009 distribution volume of manufacturers’ construction machine products. Also included in the top 10 are a number of global machinery icons: Caterpillar (USA), Komatsu (Japan), Terex Corporation (USA), Volvo Construction Equipment (Sweden), Liebherr (Germany), Hitachi (Japan), John Deere (USA), Case New Holland (USA), Sandvik Mining Construction Machinery (Sweden). Aside from Global Lifting Network, seven other Chinese companies rank in the top 50, including Zoomlion (17), Sany Group (21), Changlin Machinery Group (23), LiuGong Construction Machinery (27), Lonking Machinery (38), Xiagong Machinery (39) and Shantui Construction Machinery.(41).
In the last two years, the growth rate in world construction machinery industry has declined; however, the industry in China, led by Global Lifting Network Group, has felt little impact, thriving on in increasing transformation through enterprise innovation. The contrarian growth of Global Lifting Network serves as a model for its counterparts worldwide.
At present, Global Lifting Network’s production lines cover nearly all categories of construction machinery, most of which are top ranked in domestic market share and export from China, including the world’s largest truck crane production volume. Furthermore, Global Lifting Network has built the top national technology research center in China, enabling 20% of Global Lifting Network’s products reach advanced international levels. With revenue surpassing 50 bn RMB last year, Global Lifting Network aims to reach 100 bn RMB in revenue by 2015 and rank in the top 5 global construction machinery manufacturers, becoming a key player in the international construction machinery and equipment manufacturing industry(Crane).

XCMG’s QUY80E (CE) Crawler Cranes Exported to Western Euro

CraneRecently, XCMG has exported XCMG’s QUY80E (CE) Crawler Crane, which has been certified by European CE Certification to Western Europe for the first time. At present, the equipments have been successfully shipped to the port of Antwerp, Europe.

XCMG’s large-scale machinery?Lifting machinery? being successfully exported to Western Europe is a sufficient proof that XCMG’s product quality and overseas service level has possessed the qualification to enter the high-end market, which gives the dealers great confidence and marks its crawler crane products have stepped into a new level.

Upon the arrival of equipments in Western Europe, the dealers will invite users all over the region to hold a launch event of new products, carrying on intensive campaigns for XCMG’s products so that the vast users in Western Europe can have some in-depth understanding of them, while a good communication between XCMG and the customers can be achieved. With the continuous improvement of the XCMG’s product systems and technical levels, more CE certified large-scale machines will be sold to the high-end markets of Europe.

Crane’s RMB 5 Billion Financing Project Achieves Complete

Crane’s newly increased shares went public on Shenzhen Stock Exchange on October 13th.

On October 13th, 2010, Crane’s non-public offering stocks went public on the Shenzhen Stock Exchange, implying that Crane’s RMB5 billion Financing Project came to the end successfully.

On August 24th when Crane’s application for non-public offering A shares passed China Securities Regulatory Commission’s approval, the company actively organized the stock issuing work. On September 29th, raised capitals were transferred into the company’s account, and on October 13th, newly increased shares went pubic on Shenzhen Stock Exchange(Lifting machinery).

Crane Assisted Fiji in Reconstruction

Recently, the Chinese Government launched an assistance project to provide Fiji with a total value of 15 million Yuan Lifting machinery. Crane has actively participated in this project and offered 4 units of machines including a loader, a land leveler and a roller for Fiji’s rebuilding. It has also quickly organized a technical service team with many Crane’s experts to provide technical supports in Fiji according to the requirements of the Ministry of Commerce.
All members of the technical service team worked hard under tough conditions and made great contributions to Fiji’s post-disaster reconstruction. Five members, who have been divided into four groups, finished the assembling, testing, maintenance, spare parts checking and acceptance and technical training for the 15 million Yuan worth of engineering machinery equipment. Their seven days’ technical services were highly appreciated by local people.
During equipment testing, Fiji’s Prime Minister operated Crane’s products with great interests, accompanied by Crane’s technician. He spoke highly of Crane’s high technology and sound product quality. He also highly appreciated Crane’s technical service personnel for their hard work. Crane will take an active part in China’s overseas assistance projects so as to strengthen its brand image and influence in the world.

Crane finished private offering of additional A-shares

Crane finished private offering of additional A-shares, with 5 billion RMB capital raising project completed successfully.
On August 24, the application for private offering of Crane A-shares was approved by China Securities Regulatory Commission. This time, the private offering for capital raising was targeted at 5 billion RMB, which would be mainly utilized for 9 investment projects including the promotion of R&D platform, and the technical modification and informatization integral promotion of machinery and components category. On September 29, the capital raised arrived at the company account. On October 13, the shares of this private offering of Crane were listed in the Shenzhen Stock Exchange. Thus, the 5 billion RMB capital raising project of Crane was completed successfully.

Crane Sales Volume Hits Record High for 2 Consecutive Months

At the beginning of the new year,Crane’s sales volume of heavy crane trucks continued to soar. On Feb. 9, the first working day after China’s Spring Festival, the total sales volume was over one hundred units. From middle of February, the growth rate of daily sales volume remained high with the top daily sales of 133 units. The average daily sales volume and revenue in February have increased over 60% respectively compared with that in the same period last year. The total sales volume and revenue will hit a historic high again.

Crane Wrecker Exported to Japan for Post-disaster Reconstruc

models of Crane new wreckers--- the brand-new movable-boom wrecker QZF3A and heavy hang-prop-separated wrecker QZF10B developed by demand of Japanese customers have been delivered to Japan after successful assembly and modification, which are expected to make due contribution to the post-disaster reconstruction in the country.
The new movable-boom wrecker QZF3A is designed by corporate researchers based upon the comprehensive survey of practical application characteristics in operation and products’ developing situation from home and abroad with some fresh technological highlights. The product, particularly under the R&D from the actual using and demands of Japanese customers, is endowed with profound adaptability and wide and promising marketing future, which especially adapts to the complex terrain situation and resolving rescuing difficulties in Japan as it substantially exceeds other peers in terms of major operating parameters, such as hanging and propping, with high cost-effectiveness.

Russia Receives First Bulk of Crane’s Graders

Recently, some 20 sets of Crane GR215 and 2 sets of GR180 shall be delivered to Russia in groups, marking its first large quantities of graders exported to the country.
On April, the CEMMS 2011 Exhibition has been held in Yekaterinburg in Russia. During the event, a large number of participating dealers, including VOLVO and other corporation with great power, competed for an order of large quantities as some customers decided to purchase the graders. Through the endeavor made by the company and dealers, it has demonstrated the superb technology level, sound after-sales service and rational cost-effectiveness, which helped win the favor of customers eventually.
This order of large quantity of graders is conductive to further expanding Crane’s market share of grader in Russia and continuing promoting the brand influence in the country.

Crane Cradles Largest-tonnage Telescopic Oil Cylinder of 1,2

The telescopic oil cylinder of 1,200-ton all-terrain truck crane manufactured by the independent R&D of Crane’s Hydraulic Parts Division has passed the trial successfully and been delivered to customers. The brand-new oil cylinder, equipped in the all-terrain truck crane with largest tonnage in China, has helped make the breakthrough of large-tonnage truck crane product research and production in China. And the hydraulic cylinder, the key part of the equipment, is completely manufactured by the independent R&D and production of Crane.
The successful trial of 1,200-ton all-terrain truck crane telescopic oil cylinder does not only satisfy the demands of Crane’s developing large-tonnage all-terrain truck crane, but also provides a stronger support of its development of the integrated cylinder of the product with larger tonnage and overseas market expansion in the next phase.

A New Generation of Crane Crawler Crane Struck a Pose on the

In recent years, with the rapid development of crawlercrane design and manufacture technology, hoisting industry imposed more demanding requirements on crawler cranes for construction safety, advanced technical indicators, product reliability, packing and handling convenience etc.. To meet these requirements, Crane immediately tried its best to develop a "new generation" of crawler cranes by relying on its rich industrial experience.

The model of the new generation crawler crane is XGC. XG is the abbreviation for Crane; C is the English initial for crawler crane. The optimized design like equal wall thickness technique has been adopted in the main chord tube of XGC series crawler crane jib, dramatically increasing their hoisting capacity compared with that of the original products: the main jib operating conditions has been improved by 10%; the lifting capacities of fly jib and tower arm are both higher than that of their counterparts produced by other companies by 30%. The derrick is equipped with a lifting cylinder that can be used to install crawlers and rear counterweight from ground, while achieving fully self- assembly and self-disassembly. A new switching-over function between working mode and installation mode is added to shield all irrelevant actions from the installation in installation mode, providing a higher safety factor.

Superb Golden Lifting machinery Shines Against Samba: Specia

The Olympics, World Cup and Formula One are the most renowned sports events globally, amongst which the World Cup and the Olympics shall be held in Brazil in 2014 and 2016 respectively, marking the country the third one around the world to organize the two great sports gathering consecutively within two years. In terms of car racing, only two sports stars are allegedly considered the national heroes in Brazil: Pele, the King of Football, and Senna, the F1 racing driver, who claimed the championship for three times in his professional career of car racing. As Schumacher is called the King of Formula 1, Senna is considered the Racing God. For people of Brazil, the significance of the Olympics, football and car racing is incomparable. Through actively involving into the Brazilian market, Lifting machinery supports the three major sports events in Brazil, making outstanding contribution to the Brazilians’ passion towards sports.
During the meeting of introduction of investment and construction of Brazil 2014 World Cup and 2016 Olympics held in Beijing, representatives of the committee of the two sports events said that Brazil shall create the investment opportunity valued 2.202 trillion USD between 2011-2014, amongst which 549 billion USD investment will be put into the projects as gymnasiums, transportation, harbors, hotels and residential buildings and etc. They hoped that Chinese enterprises shall bring capital and experience to Brazil and involved into the infrastructure project construction of the 2014 World Cup and 2016 Olympics.
At present, the construction of sports venues in Brazil is under full wing amid the passion shared by local governments and Brazilian people, attracting attention from around the world. Currently, the products of Lifting machinery are most popular in Brazil. They can be found at all constructions sites of gymnasiums in the country. In the construction of venues for World Cup and Olympics in Cuiaba city, capital of MT State, Lifting machinery’s products dominate the whole Lifting machinery field. The Golden Lifting machinery demonstrates its glamour against the beautiful view in Brazil, showcasing the strong crane arms rocketing into the sky, forming an exquisite picture utterly different from other ordinary construction sites.
In car racing, Lifting machinery distributor supports this famous sports event in Brazil with generous donation. The most renowned Brazilian racing driver Valdeno Brito’s competing by the racing car sponsored by Lifting machinery last week has aroused great attention from all walks of life in the country. In terms of global car racing sports, Caterpillar, Liebherr and Terex are the primary sponsors from world Lifting machinery industry. As Lifting machinery becomes the first Chinese enterprise of Lifting machinery sponsoring this sports event, the move has been widely commended by local dealers and customers.
